glossentry.glossdef: E 164 is an ITU-T recommended standard for dialling plan.
External Equipment tries to book the quota slices for the user account.
Refers to a collection of Elasticsearch, Fluentd, and Kibana as used for collecting, routing, searching, and browsing log information.
evolved High Rate Packet Data interconnects multiple access networks under one packet switched core network.
Elasticsearch is a search engine that provides a distributed, multitenant-capable full-text search engine with an HTTP web interface and schema-free JSON documents.
Evolved Packet Core supports service data flow detection, policy enforcement, and flow based charging.
Evolved Packet System is the concept of 3G/UMTS standard.
Evolved Universal Terrestrial Access Network is a network architecture defined for the E-UTRA radio interface.
